data.text:
The 2024 Long Island Media Arts Show (LIMAS) at Five Towns College was on Friday, April 12, 2024! Doors opened at 8am. The welcome address started at 8:30am.

The LIMAS theme for 2024 was “Creative Pathways in the Digital Realm” and the artwork submission deadline was extended to March 29, from March 22, 2024. All of the details about how to register and submit artwork are available here.

This year, over 500 L.I. high school students and educators participated on campus. An art exhibition and contest, film screening, and an educational conference made the day worthwhile for emerging artists and scholars. This event has featured:

Speakers, Workshops, Demonstrations, and Panel Discussions by Media Art Industry Professionals

Student Film and Animation Screenings in the Five Towns College Performing Arts Center

Student Photography and 2D Art Exhibition in the Five Towns College Gallery

Show Floor Featuring Art Organizations

Entertainment and more!

We look forward to welcoming all high schools-teachers and students alike to our campus for the LIMAS Educational Conference. The Speakers Session is always dynamic and all will benefit from learning more about their area of expertise in the world of digital arts, multimedia, animation, film production and more! We hope that technology and art educators, and administrators will attend along with students, to enjoy this momentous day!

Any questions, email [email protected]
